Package Control

Class MenuControl

java.lang.Object
Control.MenuControl
public class MenuControl extends Object
This class contains the functions used to control the menu.

  • Field Summary

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • addFood

      private static void addFood​(FoodType type)
      Adds new food item into the menu.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of food to add.

    • deleteFood

      private static void deleteFood​(FoodType type)
      Removes the food item from the menu.
      Parameters:
      type - the food type to remove.

    • printMenu

      public static void printMenu​(boolean fullMenu)
      Prints out the type of food in the menu
      Parameters:
      fullMenu - if false will not show promotion set, if true will show all 4 food types

    • getMenuAction

      public static FoodType getMenuAction​(int choice, boolean fullMenu)
      Returns the food type selected from printMenu()
      Parameters:
      choice - the selection
      fullMenu - if false cannot return promotion set, if true can return promotion set
      Returns:
      the FoodType of the selected choice
